item.title: DESIGN West - IAR Systems I-scope probe
item.description: IAR Systems' new I-scope probe extends the power optimization possibilities available in IAR Embedded Workbench.

item.title: Firmware finds its footing
item.description: Firmware is coming of age. This series addresses the changes happening in the industry that are helping firmware to mature and find its footing.

item.title: AMD uses SoC muscle to break into broader embedded market
item.description: At the ESC DESIGN West, introduced the first in a series of single chip x86 – and ARM-based - SoC designs targeted at the mainstream of cost, power and performance sensitive segments of the embedded market.

item.title: XMOS extends deterministic event-driven MCUs into analog
item.description: At ESC DESIGN West XMOS reveals details of a new family of its xCORE event driven multicore MCUs to support analog functions

item.title: 2013 embedded systems market study
item.description: Get any group of engineers together and see what they'll complain about . . . Embedded.com's parent company has released the results of a new survey with some fascinating data.

item.title: DESIGN West - Sensor Hub BoosterPack from TI
item.description: Texas Instruments Incorporated today announced the Sensor Hub BoosterPack (BOOSTXL-SENSHUB) for the Tiva C Series TM4C123G LaunchPad at DESIGN West 2013.

item.title: DESIGN West - Altera's Cyclone V SoC Development Kit
item.description: Altera Corporation's Cyclone V SoC Development Kit enables hardware and software developers to accelerate their embedded systems design development.

item.title: DESIGN West - Express Logic's ThreadX RTOS certified for safety-critical apps
item.description: Express Logic, Inc.'s ThreadX RTOS has been certified by SGS-TÜV Saar for use in safety-critical systems.

item.title: DESIGN West - GrammaTech integrates static analysis with Eclipse dev environment
item.description: GrammaTech, Inc.'s static analysis tool, CodeSonar, is now integrated with the Eclipse IDE.

item.title: DESIGN West - VersaLogic's high reliability Mini PCIe modules
item.description: VersaLogic's new portfolio of Mini PCIe modules provide a simple, economical, standardized way to add I/O and storage functions to embedded computer products.

item.title: A portable OpenMP runtime library based on the embedded MCA APIs: Part 2
item.description: Multicore programming using a merged parallel programming model that combines OpenMP and Multicore Association’s MCAPI and MRAPI standards.

item.title: DESIGN West - McObject adds new tools to eXtremeDB 5.0 embedded DBMS
item.description: McObject has released eXtremeDB 5.0, the latest upgrade of its embedded database system, with new features that make eXtremeDB’s clustering faster, more flexible.

item.title: DESIGN West - Microchip expands embedded wireless portfolio
item.description: Microchip Technology Inc. has expanded its embedded wireless portfolio with Bluetooth, Wi-Fi and ZigBee products.

item.title: DESIGN West - Nordic Semiconductor demos 2.4GHz low energy wireless apps
item.description: Nordic Semiconductor ASA will demonstrate ULP 2.4GHz wireless connectivity solutions for smart home, security, sports & fitness, and toy sectors at DESIGN West this week.

item.title: DESIGN West - LDRA integrates NI TestStand and NI VeriStand
item.description: LDRA integrates NI TestStand ready-to-run test management software and NI VeriStand real-time test configuration software to provide automated real-time testing.

item.title: DESIGN West - LDRA LCMS for DO-178B/C, DO-278A, DO-254 compliance
item.description: The LDRA Compliance Management System (LCMS) helps companies develop the infrastructure to become DO-178B/C, DO-278A, and DO-254 compliant.

item.title: DESIGN West - ClarinoxBlue support for ThreadX platforms
item.description: ClarinoxBlue, a full-featured Bluetooth communications stack, now supports Express Logic’s ThreadX RTOS.

item.title: Embedded Linux and Android: Friends or Foes?
item.description: How to determine when to use Android and when to use embedded Linux for your embedded device.

item.title: DESIGN West: Fun, tech talk, design tips & good conversation
item.description: No matter what your idea of fun – free stuff, playing with gizmos, tearing things apart, vigorous debate, lectures and classes or visiting vendor booths – Design West is the place to be this week.

item.title: Tips on developing apps on Android devices: Part 2
item.description: Second in a two part series on the basic features and capabilities common to all Android platforms and how to develop apps for Android devices.
